api_list.name: autocomplete
api_list.description: Search our database by the name of the brewery.

random
api_list.description: Generate a list of 10 random breweries.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://breweries.p.rapidapi.com/random.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "breweries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://breweries.p.rapidapi.com/random.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "breweries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
